title: $:/GaoZhong_3/prepare_2
caption: {{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-GaoZhong_3/Word}}
phrases:
prepare something for someone: 为某人准备某物
prepare for: 为…准备，使有准备
prepare the way: 排除障碍，扫清道路
prepare for the worst: 作最坏的打算
prepare yourself: 自己做好准备
prepare material: 备料
prepare against: 为对付…作准备
sentences:
The prosecution wanted more time to prepare their case.
^^原告想要有更多的时间来准备诉讼。^^
relWords:
adj.
prepared: 准备好的；精制的
preparatory: 预备的
preparative: 准备的；预备性的

n.
preparation: 预备；准备
preparatory: 预科；预备学校
preparedness: 准备；有准备
preparative: 准备，预备
preparer: 填表人，调制机

v.
prepared: 准备（prepare的过去分词）
synos:
vt.
准备；使适合；装备；起草：provide, make, fix
